summary: These are fixed meshed for the kind of floor in the picture emitting wrong footstep wood sound. Now properly set to stone.
descriptionHtml:
These are fixed meshed for the kind of floor in the picture emitting wrong footstep wood sound. Now properly set to stone.

This was used in many castles, palaces, mansions etc., for example in some Solitude interiors [I](e.g. Solitude Justiciars Headquarters), Bards College, Solitude Blue Palace, Thalmor Embassy etc.[/I] It fixes just the collision sound to stone instead of the wrong (?) original wood sound.
That's it.

FAQ:
Q: Will it work also with my super-mega-ultra-crazy-hi-res texture replacement pack?
A: Yes. It fixes the mesh model, your applied texture will be left untouched.

Enjoy!

OLD PATCH. SUPERSEDED BY SMPC [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23833]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23833[/url]
author: Hexaae
